name: Berkeley Tool Lending Library
description: Borrow tools (power tools, lawn care equipment, etc.) free with library card
fullDescription: The Berkeley Public Library operates the only tool lending library in Northern California, allowing library cardholders to borrow tools for free.
whatTheyOffer:
- Power tools (drills, saws, sanders)
- Lawn and garden equipment
- Hand tools (hammers, wrenches, screwdrivers)
- Specialty tools (tile cutters, pipe wrenches)
- Automotive tools
- Free to borrow with library card
howToGetIt:
1. Get a Berkeley Public Library card (free for residents)
2. Visit the Tool Lending Library at the South Branch
3. Browse available tools in person
4. Check out tools with your library card
5. Return within the borrowing period (typically 3-7 days)
